game.name: Party Party Anxiety!
game.genres: Casual, Indie, Strategy, Free To Play
game.shortDescription: A dating card game for anxious people. Use conversation cue cards up your sleeves to make connections. But beware—the more anxious you get, the scarier they become.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A dating card game for anxious people. Use conversation cue cards up your sleeves to make connections. But beware—the more anxious you get, the scarier they become.
